name: TurnTurnnTurnnn
description:
This is my first Unity work! ! 

I was studying Unity at Udemy and I wanted to make a game somehow, so I decided to make it.

 The idea was twisted from the ad of a smartphone that appeared persistently.

****************

 The file contains readmeJP and readmeEG. The readmeEG is listed below.

****************

Work homepage
https://scrapbox.io/yutateno/TurnTurnnTurnnn

_About this game
A 3D puzzle solving game.

_Starting method
Please execute “TurnTurnnTurnnn.exe”.

_Basic operation
[keyboard]
WASD key: Move
ESC key: End of game
Mouse: UI selection

* Only keyboard is supported.

_Acknowledgment
The following software and library were used to produce this work.

software
